text: Jalan Lencongan Timur, or Sungai Petani Eastern Bypass, Federal Route 225, is a major highway bypass in Sungai Petani, Kedah, Malaysia. The Kilometre Zero of the Federal Route 225 is located at Jalan Badlishah near Bedong, at its interchange with the Federal Route 1, the main trunk road of the central of Peninsular Malaysia. ==Features== At most section, the Federal Route 225 was built under the JKR R5 road standard, allowing maximum speed limit of up to 90 km/h. ==List of junctions== {|class="wikitable" |- !Km||Exit||Junctions||To||Remarks |- | 0 || ||Jalan Badlishah Junctions||North Alor Star Gurun Guar Cempedak Merbok Lembah Bujang Gunung Jerai South Sungai Petani town centre North–South Expressway Northern Route Bukit Kayu Hitam Penang Kuala Lumpur ||T-junctions |- |style="width:600px" colspan="6" style="text- align:center;
